intent_atoms.description: The system must always register a parser for mdhd boxes in ISOInspectorKit and provide tests validating timestamp, timescale, duration, and language metadata extraction.
Schedule macOS CLI/UI large-file benchmark execution using the R4 protocol once dedicated hardware runners are available.
macOS automation with Instruments support must be available to run the large-file benchmark; fixtures and manifest revisions should be tracked in the specified documentation.
Execute macOS DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export, and hardware-dependent QA once runners are available following the release readiness runbook.
macOS infrastructure must support DocC generation, notarization, TestFlight export and QA; relevant runbooks and archival notes must be referenced.
Execute random slice benchmark suite on macOS hardware once Combine support is available to compare mapped vs. chunked readers.
macOS runner with Combine must present identical workloads for benchmarking; documentation references must follow.
Run ParseTreeStreamingSelectionAutomationTests on macOS with XCTest UI support to validate SwiftUI automation flow.
